name: Microwave Story (Demo)
description:
Microwave what you've always wanted to microwave in the hottest simulation game ever created!

And earn money as you discover a dark-ish secret!


Note

The game is still being developed, and this is an alpha preview of it. The storyline is not yet complete, and some of the unlockables are not yet available . Sorry!

Any feedbacks are welcome!
